sentences.en: Are you aware these notes are counterfeit?
sentences.cn: 你觉察到这些钞票是伪造的吗？

sentences.en: He attended his lectures and took copious notes.
sentences.cn: 他去听他的课，做了大量的笔记。

sentences.en: He lost his place in his notes.
sentences.cn: 他忘了稿子讲到哪里了。

sentences.en: He took out his fat wallet and peeled off some notes.
sentences.cn: 他掏出鼓鼓的钱包，抽出几张钞票。

sentences.en: He wrote a few more notes on the board.
sentences.cn: 他在黑板上又写了几条注释。

sentences.en: Inflation was so high that the notes were like Monopoly money.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀严重，货币变得跟“大富翁”游戏钞票无异。

sentences.en: Many of the notes are out of tune.
Read these notes carefully and keep them for future reference.
sentences.cn: 仔细阅读这些注释并将其保留下来以备将来之用。

sentences.en: She sat expressionless, carefully taking notes.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那儿面无表情，认真记着笔记。

sentences.en: The melody that ran through his brain was composed of bad notes.
sentences.cn: 回荡在他脑海里的旋律都走调了。

sentences.en: The newly discover-ed notes are nothing more than Lang's personal journal.
sentences.cn: 新发现的笔记只不过是朗的个人日志。

sentences.en: There are explanatory notes at the back of the book.
These statements are accompanied by a series of explanatory notes.
sentences.cn: 这些陈述后面有一系列解释性注释。

sentences.en: They exchange traveller's cheques at a different rate from notes.
sentences.cn: 他们兑换旅行支票时依据的汇率跟兑换现钞时不同。

sentences.en: Watson has a wonderful voice, with thrillingly clear top notes.
sentences.cn: 沃森的嗓音美妙，高音嘹亮动听。

phrases.tran_cn: 做笔记；做记录；把…记下来

trans.tran_cn: 注意( note的名词复数 )，笔记，单音，特征
